summary: Completed comprehensive implementation tasks for Beauty Booking module: Created Form Request validation classes for all API and Web controllers (BeautySubscriptionPurchaseRequest, BeautyVendorRegisterRequest, BeautyVendorUploadDocumentsRequest, BeautyVendorUpdateWorkingHoursRequest, BeautyVendorManageHolidaysRequest, BeautyVendorProfileUpdateRequest, BeautyServiceApiStoreRequest, BeautyServiceApiUpdateRequest, BeautyStaffApiStoreRequest, BeautyStaffApiUpdateRequest, BeautyBookingRefundRequest, BeautyBookingForceCancelRequest). All code passes linter checks with no errors.
